body: get_inputs_by_op get_inputs_by_op(op:op.op.Op, store:Mapping[str, Any]) -> Any Retrieve the necessary input data from the data dictionary in order to run an op. Args: op : The op to run. store : The system's data dictionary to draw inputs out of. Returns: Input data to be fed to the `op` forward function.
title: get_inputs_by_op
